## Review of commands  {.smaller}


| Action | macOS (Terminal) | Windows (PowerShell) |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Show current folder | `pwd` | `pwd` |
| List files in folder | `ls` | `ls` |
| Change into a folder | `cd <folder>` | `cd <folder>` |
| Go up one level | `cd ..` | `cd ..` |
| Create a new folder | `mkdir <folder>` | `mkdir <folder>` |
| Make an empty file | `touch <filename>` | `New-Item <filename>` |
| View a text file quickly | `cat <filename>` | `Get-Content <filename>` |

- need to be inside of a git repo directory to use git commands
